Package org.cpnsim.statemanager

Class SimpleStateEasy

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.statemanager.SimpleStateEasy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleState
public class SimpleStateEasy extends Object implements SimpleState
A class implementing the SimpleState interface. When synchronizing the state to the inter-scheduler, it will generate a simple copy of the state, see SimpleStateEasyObject.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

    • generate

      public Object generate()
      Description copied from interface: SimpleState
      Generate an object copy of the simple state. This function is used to synchronize the state to the inter-scheduler. Depending on the class that implements the simple state, the object copy can be different.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface SimpleState
      Returns:
      a copy of the simple state.
